input.sentences: this is going to be a series of pictures of birds . these birds flock to the shorelines in and sometimes display murmurations in the sky .
here one bird out of the many is taking solace in the water .
here is another closeup of the same bird showing its reflection in the water .
this was a cool photo of the birds beginning to form a murmuration behind the ferris wheel .
some birds defected from the flocks to rest on one of the ferris wheel 's cages .
output.sentences: The beach was teaming with sea birds that day.
One bird in particular was enjoying a nice soak to relieve his aching feet.
He had been there for hours, not realizing his friends had taken off.
They were now all enjoying a calm ride on the local ferris wheel.
Yet none of them had realized they had left their friend behind.
